headline: Tax Management Market Global Forecast Report 2025-2030 | Indirect Tax Segment to Grow Fastest Amid Digital Compliance Shifts
summary: Key growth drivers in the tax management market include the demand for agile tax infrastructure supporting global operations and AI's role in enhancing tax accuracy. E-invoicing mandates accelerate modernization of legacy systems. The indirect tax segment, driven by VAT, GST, and sales tax compliance, is set to grow rapidly. Large enterprises hold the largest market share, aligning with complex compliance needs. North America leads due to strong regulatory frameworks, while Asia Pacific fuels gr
